pullrequest.title: Config and cmake fixes for Windows build

content.raw: So easy step to make this closer to merging: replace hardcoded paths to F: or Program Files with environment variables: `PROGRAMFILES` refers to the non-x86 version. using `SYSTEMDRIVE` will get you just the F: or C: part if you need it.
content.html: So easy step to make this closer to merging: replace hardcoded paths to F: or Program Files with environment variables: PROGRAMFILES refers to the non-x86 version. using SYSTEMDRIVE will get you just the F: or C: part if you need it.
